snippet: The latest assault on President Obama’s health care law appears to have little chance of approval in the Senate.
abstract: House, in another assault on Pres Obama's health care law, votes 270 to 146 to repeal a new tax on medical devices; bill has little chance of approval in the Senate.
lead_paragraph: The latest assault on President Obama’s health care law appears to have little chance of approval in the Senate.

headline.seo: Bill to Repeal Tax on Medical Devices Clears House
headline.main: House Acts to Repeal Medical-Device Tax
headline.print_headline: House Acts to Repeal Medical-Device Tax

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
